title: Should I buy Kled or Gnar
body: Hey guys I need an opinion on who should I buy Kled or Gnar ? I really enjoy champions like illaoi or darius who can deal crazy damage if played properly. I have seen guides about both of these champions and I still can't decide who I should spend my BE on. I dont care If the champion has a huge learning curve since I'll try my best to master them.
